Html:
Hi,

Is it possible to show report viewer in a separate modal WPF window than adding it in an existing region of the Shell?

Thanks,

Hi,

Based on my understanding, you would be able to add the Report Viewer in a View regardless this View being on the MainWindow, ChildWindow, or a Popup.

Below you may find a RegionInChildWindowWithNavigation Silverlight sample of how to add a UserControl View into a ChildWindow. Although it is a Silverlight solution, the Region definition into the ChildWindow could be easily reproduced in a WPF App:

  • RegionInChildWindowWithNavigation sample
You could then add the Report Viewer in the ChildWindow View like adding it on any UserControl View.

I wish you find this handy,
Regards.

Gabriel Ostrowsky
